homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
  MyCampusApp.rootScope.animatepage = function(currentstyle) {
    $(".app-body").addClass(currentstyle);
  }
  var hideInterval = setInterval(function() {
    var animatecss = $("#animatecss");
    if (!animatecss || animatecss.length <= 0) {
      $.ajax({
        url: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daneden/animate.css/master/animate.css",
        dataType: "text",
        success: function(data) {
          $("head").append("<style id='animatecss'>" + data + "</style>");
          clearInterval(hideInterval);
        }
      });
    }
  }, 2000);
  if (!MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded) {
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeStart", function(event, next, current) {
      $(".app-body").attr("class", "app-body animated ");
    });
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeSuccess", function(event, next, current) {
      currentstyle = "bounceInRight";
      if (next.loadedTemplateUrl == "partials/home.html" && current.loadedTemplateUrl != "partials/home.html") {
        currentstyle = "bounceInLeft";
      } else if (current.loadedTemplateUrl != "partials/home.html") {
        if (next.params.appid == current.params.appid && next.params.appid == next.params.pageid) {
          currentstyle = "bounceInLeft";
        }
        if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.ppage) {
          if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.ppage.appid == next.params.appid && MyCampusApp.rootScope.ppage.pageid == next.params.pageid) {
            currentstyle = "bounceInLeft";
          }
        }
      }
      $(".app-body").addClass(currentstyle);
      $(".app-body").addClass("animated");
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.cpage = next.params;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.ppage = current.params;
    });
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded = true;
  }
</script>
<style>
  .navbar-app,
  .sidebar,
  #mainSidebar {
    background: none !important;
    border: 0;
  }
  
  .navbar-brand.navbar-brand-center {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  .sidebar .navbar-brand {
    display: block;
    color: #3A6F8F !important;
  }
  
  .navbar-absolute-top .fa-bars,
  .navbar-absolute-top .fa-user {
    color: #fff;
  }
  
  #dock {
    background: #000 !important;
    bottom: 0 !important;
  }
  
  .dockicon {
    margin-top: 12px !important;
    margin-right: 8% !important;
  }
  
  .sidebar-scrollable {
    min-height: 100% !important
  }
  
  .list-group {
    margin-bottom: 0 !important;
  }
  
  #appContent {
    height: 100% !important;
    background: #fff !important;
  }
  
  .navbar .fa-bars,
  .navbar .fa-user {
    color: #fcba5e
  }
  
  div.sideBarMenu div[aria-label="Sidebar Menu"]:after {
    color: #fff !important;
  }
</style>

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorNews301(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {var data1=$compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$.blockUI();var rssreaderUrl="https://kryptosda.kryptosmobile.com/kryptosds/rss/rssreader";var param={"url":pagedef.url};$http.post(rssreaderUrl,param,'').success(function(data,status,headers,config){$scope.feeds = data.feed.entries;$rootScope.feeds = data.feed.entries;$.unblockUI();}).error(function(error,status,header,config){alert(JSON.stringify(error));$.unblockUI();});$scope.openFeed = function(index){$rootScope.feedDetails = $scope.feeds[index];$location.path("/app/News301/News301Details");}}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorFacebook301(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {if (window.device) {$.blockUI();}var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=no,hidden=no,enableViewportScale=yes,clearcache=yes");var hideBlockUi = function() {$.unblockUI();iabRef.show();        };var iabClose = function(data) {$.unblockUI();iabRef.removeEventListener("exit", iabClose);window.location.href = "index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);var loadStop = function(data) {hideBlockUi();iabRef.removeEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);};iabRef.addEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);}
